title: Ghostcountry's Wrath
description: After saving the Cherokee Otherworld in Sunshaker's War, Calvin is haunted by the ghost of his father. To put the spirit to rest, he must venture into the Darkening Lands. First, Calvin incurs the wrath of an evil Cherokee witch who is out for the magical items Calvin possesses. He is aided in his quest by a half-human panther woman who has been enslaved by the witch. Original.
author: Tom Deitz
